Tables

This example features tfoot, thead, and tbody elements. This example has a basic responsive solution: wrap a block level element around it and give it a class of table-container

Total $11,874.72
Name Dates City Currency
Mrs. McCave 02/12/2008 Washington D.C. $2,578.22
Jeffrey 02/23/2008 St. Louis $3,300.37
Pee Wee 02/12/2008 Washington D.C. $2,578.22

Implementation


<div class="table-container">
    <table>
        <tfoot>
            <tr>
                <th scope="row" colspan="3" class="left">Total</th>
                <td class="currency">$11,874.72</td>
            </tr>
        </tfoot>
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th scope="col">Name</th>
                <th scope="col">Dates</th>
                <th scope="col">City</th>
                <th scope="col" class="currency">Currency</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <tr>
                <td>Mrs. McCave</td>
                <td>02/12/2008</td>
                <td>Washington D.C.</td>
                <td class="currency">$2,578.22</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>Jeffrey</td>
                <td>02/23/2008</td>
                <td>St. Louis</td>
                <td class="currency">$3,300.37</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>Pee Wee</td>
                <td>02/12/2008</td>
                <td>Washington D.C.</td>
                <td class="currency">$2,578.22</td>
            </tr>
        </tbody>
    </table>
</div>

Accordion Tables

This example shows a table with expandable rows. There are a few dependencies:

  • The table element must have a class of accordion-table.
  • The tr element that acts as a parent should get a class of parent-row and a unique data-id attribute.
  • The first th or td in the parent row must have a class of expand-controller.
  • All child rows must have a class of child-row AND
  • All child rows must have the same data-id attribute as their corresponding parent.
Total $11,874.72
Name Dates City Currency
Mrs. McCave 02/12/2008 Washington D.C. $2,578.22
Bodkin Van Horn 02/12/2008 Washington D.C. $2,578.22
Hoos-Foos 02/12/2008 Washington D.C. $2,578.22
Snimm 02/12/2008 Washington D.C. $2,578.22
Jeffrey 02/23/2008 St. Louis $3,300.37
Pee Wee 02/12/2008 Washington D.C. $2,578.22
Buck Buck McFate 02/12/2008 Washington D.C. $2,578.22
Oliver Boliver Butt 02/12/2008 Washington D.C. $2,578.22
Weepy Weed 02/12/2008 Washington D.C. $2,578.22

Implementation


<div class="table-container">
    <table class="accordion-table">
        <tfoot>
            <tr>
                <th scope="row" colspan="3" class="left">Total</th>
                <td class="currency">$11,874.72</td>
            </tr>
        </tfoot>
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th scope="col">Name</th>
                <th scope="col">Dates</th>
                <th scope="col">City</th>
                <th scope="col" class="currency">Currency</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <tr class="parent-row" data-id="mccave">
                <td class="expand-controller">Mrs. McCave</td>
                <td>02/12/2008</td>
                <td>Washington D.C.</td>
                <td class="currency">$2,578.22</td>
            </tr>
            <!-- child row start -->
                <tr class="child-row" data-id="mccave">
                    <td>Bodkin Van Horn</td>
                    <td>02/12/2008</td>
                    <td>Washington D.C.</td>
                    <td class="currency">$2,578.22</td>
                </tr>
                <tr class="child-row" data-id="mccave">
                    <td>Hoos-Foos</td>
                    <td>02/12/2008</td>
                    <td>Washington D.C.</td>
                    <td class="currency">$2,578.22</td>
                </tr>
                <tr class="child-row" data-id="mccave">
                    <td>Snimm</td>
                    <td>02/12/2008</td>
                    <td>Washington D.C.</td>
                    <td class="currency">$2,578.22</td>
                </tr>
            <!-- /child row end -->
        </tbody>
    </table>
</div>
